name: MasterSha
0:
”Alexa, Ask Master Sha for a daily mantra”
”Alexa, Ask Master Sha for the love, peace, and harmony song”
”Alexa Ask Master Sha for a guided meditation”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: master sha
des:
Welcome to the Master Sha Alexa Voice Skill. Here you will discover teachings, wisdom, blessings and more from Dr. & Master Sha, the renowned, award-winning healer & teacher. Join in and experience this ancient wisdom for the modern world, guided by Master Sha himself. Follow his wisdom and teachings to experience transformation in all aspects of your life.
The Master Sha Alexa Voice application aims to harness the power of new technology by providing a number of enlightening experiences. The aim is to bring love, peace, health, happiness and harmony to your life.

RECEIVE DAILY BLESSINGS
Receive Tao Song blessings with world-renowned Healer, Master Sha. As a Divine, Tao, and Source Channel, Master Sha offers extraordinary soul healing blessings. Listen to the different blessings regularly to help transform and remove blockages in many aspects of your life. The daily blessings will focus on boosting your immunity and energy along with reducing feelings of fear in these unprecedented times.

EMBRACE DAILY MANTRAS
Learn powerful new mantras to support your total health and well-being. These mantras are for healing, rejuvenation and life transformation. Relax, focus on the aspect of life you would like to transform and chant along with Master Sha.

EXPERIENCE GUIDED MEDITATION
Experience a guided meditation with Master Sha. In this short session, you will be led step by step into a state of deep relaxation and inner stillness. It's one of the most powerful ways to eliminate stress, bring about calmness and positive personal changes.

CHANT ALONG WITH THE LOVE, PEACE & HARMONY SONG
The Love, Peace & Harmony soul song is a unique Divine Soul Song to help create a world full of love, peace & harmony. The song carries a high frequency and vibration of divine love, forgiveness, compassion and light. Connect with your heart and soul as you relax, listen, sing and bathe in the frequency of this song.

DISCLAIMER
This Alexa skill does not provide medical advice, and is for informational and educational purposes only, and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, treatment or diagnosis. Call your doctor to receive medical advice. If you think you may have a medical emergency, please dial your local emergency response phone number.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
